sentence: So weve got years of people calling into question elections any time theyre close.? More than a week after voting ended in Georgia in 2018, Abrams gave a carefully worded speech in which she accused her opponent, then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp, of voter suppression, while also acknowledging he would be certified the victor of the election.
title: After 2020, a candidate conceding an election is no longer a sure thing
